ResourceHeader.Description: The Automatic Weather Station (AWS) (MAWS201; Vaisala) at Kototabang in West Smatra, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL) measures surface precipitation, temperature, relative humidity, pressure and wind direction and speed. This instrument has been operated by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere (RISH), Kyoto University since August 8, 1999. Detailed description of this AWS can be found in the document (http://www.vaisala.com/Vaisala%20Documents/Brochures%20and%20Datasheets/MAWS201-Datasheet-B211006EN-A-LoRes.pdf).

Instrument.InvestigationName: CPEA (Coupling Processes in the Equatorial Atmosphere)
